author: sf1378
title: Extra figure may be included, which varies it seems...
review:
Just to let everyone know, this issue may come with an extra figure, I saw it with Ewar (I think, it may have been Vornon) as well as Lundor in WH Smith in Reading but when I actually got a copy today it came with a Crug minifigure. The contents page only details Lundor as the 'free gift' this month...

You get the usual shebang to make minifigures, they come with their accessories as pictured on their foil bags but for the £4.99 price it isn't really a bargain buy.

Incidentally, if anyone knows why the figures have what seem to be moulded removable 'animal masks' as well as double printed faces on their actual 'heads' that go underneath the 'animal masks' please explain as I wonder if these figures are supposed to be wearing 'masks' or the 'mask' is their 'actual' face...?
